description.value: More future memories of time magic percolate back to the present, teaching you spells you've yet to learn. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Behold the Weave]{Behold the Weave}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Cast into Time]{Cast into Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Loose Time's Arrow]{Loose Time's Arrow}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Quicken Time]{Quicken Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Slow]{Slow}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Stagnate Time]{Stagnate Time} to your spell list. You can thus potentially learn these spells even if they aren't normally on your tradition's spell list.
